value.title: Charticulator Visual IS HERE!!! - Season 1 Episode 1
value.excerpt: We walk through a first look at the new Charticulator visual from Microsoft Power BI team.    Official blog post about the visual: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/announcing-the-new-charticulator-visual-public-preview/  Visit the early version of Charticulator: https://charts.powerbi.tips Visual

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Intro to Tabular Editor
value.excerpt: Tabular Editor is an incredible Tool that enables users to manipulate a Tabular Model at lighting speeds.  Daniel Otykier is the creator of Tabular Editor.  This video will explain the basic functionalities of the program.    Watch the full Series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLn1m_aBmgsbGvz4SsmO_fkeThjDUSWFkf

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Introduction to DAX Studio - By Darren Gosbell
value.excerpt: DAX Studio is the tool for data model tuning.  Darren Gosbell the creator of DAX Studio will be giving a live demo of his tool.    In this webinar we will be reviewing the following topics:  - What is DAX Studio?  - Why should I use DAX Studio?  - Getting started and connecting DAX Studio to various

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Model Performance Tuning in DAX Studio - By Marco Russo
value.excerpt: DAX Studio is the tool for data model tuning.  Marco Russo contributor to DAX Studio will be giving us a deep dive and demo around using DAX Studio for Model Performance Tuning.   You will not want to miss this event as Marco is a wealth of knowledge for all things Data Modeling!  Watch the Full Tutorial

value.title: Create Row Number for Each Group in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: If you want to create a row-number statically as a pre-calculation in Power BI, then Power Query has a very simple way of doing it; Add Index Column. However, the Index column creates the row number regardless of any grouping or categorization. sometimes you want to take that into account too. There

value.title: Custom Functions Made Easy in Power BI
value.excerpt: I have written a lot about Power Query M scripting language, and how to create custom functions with that. value.title: Customer Retention in Power BI   DAX Measures
value.excerpt: Customer retention is one of the most common scenarios of data analysis, which is very useful for business. value.excerpt: Parallel Period is a function that helps you fetching the previous period of a Month, Quarter, or Year. value.title: Sentiment Colors for Gauge Visual in Power BI
value.excerpt: Gauge Visual is a great visual for KPIs, however, the Gauge visual in Power BI doesn’t have the sentiment colors as an option. value.title: Visualization Tip   Change to Filter instead of highlight   Control the Interaction in Power BI
value.excerpt: Power BI reports are highly interactive, If you select a column in a column chart other charts will be highlighted.
